title: Hotel Restaurante La Parilla
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A traditional Spanish restaurant catering mainly to locals. Located on the first floor of the hotel (which is upstairs). Staff is accommodating to veg guests. Starters are mainly vegetarian and/or vegan, but are not labeled as such. Try the mixed salad with sliced peaches, pineapple, asparagus, peppers, tomatoes and capers or the mushroom pasta.
